desc: Dr. Lens CBD offers power-packed roll-on with immediate pain relief for sore muscles, backaches, stiff joints, and more. Doctor & Chemist formulated.

layout.text: America's only Doctor/Chemist formulated CBD product
Highest Quality Guaranteed with 10 times the CBD dosage
Formulated & overseen by an in-house Doctor & Chemist(M.D. / PhD)
Fastest & highest absorption of CBD within minutes with our proprietary transdermal formulation vs. gummies and tinctures which absorb only at a small fraction of our rate many hours later
